Header: Strong laws against hate speech and false information
Content: The Cabinet of Ministers has granted approval to amend the Penal Code and the Code of Criminal Procedure to enable legal action against individuals who propagate hate speech and false information. The aim of the Cabinet decision is to prevent false information and hate speech that hinder national reconciliation and state security. The offenders will be subjected to a one million rupee fine or a five year imprisonment under the revision of the legislation.
